channel.title: Making soul split give u 1/5 hp PLease help -I VAIN- or any good coders
channel.description:
Pi source 317
Ok so this is what it is.
I changed smite into soul split and im fine with it smiting. But i want to make it so it takes 1/5 hp of the person you are fighting . also if u know how can i make it do the gfx of the circles/rings around ur opponents everytime it takes a part of there hp that would be great
PLEASEEEE HELP iv beeen trying to figure this out for like a week
